original: yo hi yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetoreva utpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati,

na punar tad bhāve hetu antaram apekṣate

original: na hi prakāśādayastadātmāna utpannāḥ punaḥ prakāśādibhāve hetvantaramapekṣante /

original: tadvadasthitidharmā cet svabhāvato bhāvo niṣpanno na punastadātmatāyāṃ hetvantaramapekṣate /

original: bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt tatsvabhāvasya paścādiva prāgāpi jananaprasaṅgāt /

original: pūrvabhāvinastu avasthāviśeṣā aṅkurakāraṇasya kāraṇāni iti nānekāntaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva bhāvinaḥ tu avasthā viśeṣāḥ aṅkura kāraṇasya kāraṇāni iti na anekāntaḥ

original: (2.10) yadi te 'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti pratyekamiti /

original: na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā yataḥ ayamasmāsvanyatamo 'pi samarthaḥ kimasmābhiḥ kartavyam ityālocyāpare nivarteran /

original: te samarthāḥ kiṃ nāparāparaṃ janayantīti cet /

original: (2.11) bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhya ekakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāditi cet / na /

original: yathā mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrā dibhyo bhavato ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍādamṛtsvabhāvebhyo vṛkṣādibhyo

original: bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāttasyaiva mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthāviśeṣātmatayā tadanyebhyo

original: bhinnaḥ sūtrāttasyaiva mṛtsaṃsthāna viśeṣātmanaḥ cakrādervibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: bhinnaḥ sūtrāt tasya eva mṛd saṃsthāna viśeṣa ātmanaḥ cakra ādeḥ vibhaktaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhavati

original: na ca tayoḥ śāktiviśeṣaviṣayabhede 'pi tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasya kāryasya svabhāvena bhedaḥ mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛdrūpābhyāṃ  #

original: (2.12) anyadeva saṃsthānaṃ guṇo mṛddravyāt tena bhinnasvabhāvaḥ kulālamṛtpiṇḍayorupayogaviśeṣa iti cet /

uktam atra

original: api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ kulālaḥ kiṃ na pṛthakkaroti?

original: guṇasya dravyaparatantratvāt sa kathaṃ pṛthak kriyeta?

original: tadā kimiti kulālavyāpāramapekṣate iti cet / na /

original: anyathā mṛtpiṇḍasya svabhāvata eva tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatve vastuna eva prāgapi yogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa  #

original: evaṃ tarthi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavatīti nānayoḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ /

original: asti tāvadekasvabhāvatve 'pi ekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣateti kiṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ekasvabhāvatvasādhanāya atinirbandhena /

original: (2.13) tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā naikopayogaviṣayāḥ kāryasyaikasvabhāvatve 'pi vastuta iti yatheha kāraṇabhedo bhinnaviśeṣopayogāt naikakāryaḥ,

tathā hi samanantara pratyayāt vijñānāt cakṣuḥ vijñānasya upalambha ātma tā tasya eva upalambha ātmanaḥ
sataḥ cakṣuḥ indriyāt rūpa grahaṇa yogya tā pratiniyamaḥ viṣayāt tad tulya rūpa tā iti abhinna tve

original: 'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhvantīti

original: ta evaite kāraṇaśaktibhedā yathāsvaṃ prativiśiṣṭakāryajanane 'vyavadheyaśaktitayā pratyupasthitāḥ kṣaṇikatvātsāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśrayaityucyante
analyzed: te eva ete kāraṇa śakti bhedāḥ yathāsvam prati viśiṣṭa kārya janane avyavadheya śakti tayā pratyupasthitāḥ kṣaṇika tvāt sāmagrī kāryasya svabhāva sthiti āśrayaḥ iti ucyante

original: tathāhi tattebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ upalambhātmakaṃ rūpagrahaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ viṣayarūpaṃ ceti prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvamekameva jātam /

original: (2.14) apratirodhaśaktikeṣu anantarakāryeṣu anādheyaviśeṣeṇu kṣaṇikeṣu pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ?

original: te samarthā eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti,

yebhyaḥ ca anantaram eva kāryam utpadyate

analyzed: apara apara pratyaya yogena pratikṣaṇam bhinna śaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvantaḥ yadi api kutaścid sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante tathā api bhitraḥ eva eṣām svabhāvaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ teṣām paraspara upasarpaṇa ādi āśrayaḥ pratyaya viśeṣaḥ sa tad hetu janane samarthaḥ

original: tena yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādihetuḥ sa samarthasya heturiti tatra na kadācidanyathābhāvaḥ /

original: (2.16) anena nyāyena sarvatra hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamo draṣṭavyaḥ pratikṣaṇamanyānyasvabhāvabhedānvayinīṣu śaktiṣu,

kim na karoti

original: antyāvasthāyāṃ prāgasamarthasya sāmarthyotpattau tasya sāmarthyasya tatsvabhāvatve 'pūrvotpattirevasā /

original: yadi nāma kiñcit kathañcidatrabhavato darśanaviṣayatām atikrāmet,

original: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe te ete kārakasvabhāvā iti /

original: kāryaṃ tu pratyayāntarāpekṣamiti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti,

original: tasyāpi kathaṃ- sa bhāvaḥ kevalo 'pi karotyeva?
analyzed: tasya api katham sa bhāvaḥ kevalaḥ api karoti eva

original: kāryaṃ ca tasmātrotpadyate iti tadavastho virodhaḥ /
analyzed: kāryam ca tasmāt atra utpadyate iti tad avasthaḥ virodhaḥ
na kevalaḥ karoti eva iti ced
katham idānīm akṣepa kriyā svabhāvaḥ
nanu etat eva paridīpitam bhavati
karoti eva iti

original: kāryaṃ cāyaṃ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ san paramapekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta?
analyzed: kāryam ca ayam kevalaḥ api samarthaḥ san param apekṣamāṇam katham upekṣeta
param an ādṛtya etat prasahya kuryāt

original: evaṃ hi anenātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evam hi anena ātmanaḥ sāmarthyam darśitam bhavati

original: kāryaṃ paramapekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattimasya kathayasi sa kevalo 'pi samarthasvabhāva iti tataḥ utpattiṃ brūṣe,
analyzed: kāryam param apekṣate iti tatas kevalāt anutpattim asya kathayasi sa kevalaḥ api samartha svabhāvaḥ iti tatas utpattim brūṣe
ete ca katham evatram syātām
tat ayam īrṣyā śalya vitudyamāna marmā viklavam vikrośati iti upekṣām eva arhati
tasmāt idam eka artha kriyā lakṣaṇam sahakāri tvam kṣaṇikānām eva bhāvānām

original: na tu akṣaṇikānāṃ yeṣāṃ pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati pṛthak kāryakaraṇasambhavena sahakāritvaniyamāyogāt /
analyzed: na tu akṣaṇikānām yeṣām pṛthak api bhāvaḥ sambhavati pṛthak kārya karaṇa sambhavena sahakāri tva niyama ayogāt

original: (2.21) yatra tu santānopakāreṇa bhāvāḥ hetutāṃ pratipadyante,
analyzed: yatra tu santāna upakāreṇa bhāvāḥ hetu tām pratipadyante
yathā taṇḍula bīja ādibhyaḥ odana aṅkura ādi janmani dahana udaka pṛthivī ādayaḥ

original: tatra santānāśrayeṇa viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate na dravyāśrayeṇa,
analyzed: tatra santāna āśrayeṇa viśeṣa utpādanam pratyayānām sahakriyā ucyate na dravya āśrayeṇa
kṣaṇike dravye viśeṣasya anutpatteḥ

original: nahi taṇḍulādīnāṃ viśeṣānutpattau dahanādibhāve 'pi odanajanma syāt /
analyzed: nahi taṇḍula ādīnām viśeṣa anutpattau dahana ādi bhāve api odana janma syāt

original: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyeta tadā prāgivārthapratilpattiṃ naiva janayet
analyzed: tathā prabhāsvarāt apavarakam praviṣṭasya yadi indriyam sva upakāribhyaḥ atiśayam krameṇa na pratipadyeta tadā prāk iva artha pratilpattim nā eva janayet

original: akṣepakāriṣu indriyādiṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati /
analyzed: akṣepa kāriṣu indriya ādiṣu na viśeṣa utpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati

original: tatra yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayairye yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante ityekārthakriyaiva  #
analyzed: tatra yathāsvam pratyayaiḥ paraspara upasarpaṇa ādi āśrayaiḥ ye yogya deśa ādi avasthāḥ jātāḥ te saha svabhāva niṣpattyā jñāna hetu tām pratipadyante iti eka artha kriyā eva

original: (2.22) yatra tu viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra hetusantānaḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāvāntarasya pratilambhaḥ
analyzed: yatra tu viśeṣam utpādayantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra hetu santānaḥ pratyaya antarāṇi apekṣate iti tatas svabhāva antarasya pratilambhaḥ

original: tatra svarasataḥ hetupratyayānāṃ pūrvopanipātakṣaṇānāṃ nivṛttau tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpattirevaṃ krameṇa yāvadatyantātiśayavato 'ntyakāraṇakalāpāt  #
analyzed: tatra svarasataḥ hetu pratyayānām pūrva upanipāta kṣaṇānām nivṛttau tebhyaḥ eva viśiṣṭa kṣaṇa utpattiḥ evam krameṇa yāvat atyanta atiśayavataḥ antya kāraṇa kalāpāt
kārya utpattiḥ

a viśiṣṭāt viśeṣa utpattau kāryasya api syāt

original: tataśca parasparaviśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran /

tena akṣaṇikānām api sahakāri sāpekṣāṇām kāraṇa tā syāt

atha sahakāriṇā kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa jananāya kṛta viśeṣaḥ eva upattiṣṭheta
evam sati anavasthā syāt

original: na ca sahakāriṇaḥ parasparakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane nityaṃ yogyāvasthāḥ,
analyzed: na ca sahakāriṇaḥ paraspara kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa utpādane nityam yogya avasthāḥ
yena nitya anuṣaktaḥ eṣām viśeṣaḥ syāt
tad upāya apāyayoḥ kāryasya utpatti anutpatti darśanāt

original: tenādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya notpadyata iti cet /
analyzed: tena ādyaḥ viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ nirupakārasya nā utpadyate iti ced

original: nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne 'pi kaścidudvego bhavati yadyevamapi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati /

original: (2.24) atha kathamekārthakriyāpi bhavet sāpi na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /

original: atroktamuttaraṃ pratikṣaṇamaparāparaiḥ pratyayaiḥ yathā bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ,

original: kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca sahakāribhiḥ akṣepakārindriyavijñānavacca kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāditi sarvamuktam /

original: (2.25) tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santānopakārāpekṣakāraṇakāryajanmani sahakāriṇāmādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmā na bhavati,

analyzed: anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyāḥ api sāmagrayāḥ avilakṣaṇa kārya utpattau na kāraṇa bheda abhedābhyām kārya bheda abhedau iti ahetukau viśvasya bheda abhedau syātām

original: tadvyatiriktaśca na kaścidbhāvasvabhāva ityahetukatvādbhāvānāṃ nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /

original: tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇādapi tasyotpattau na tajjananaśaktipratiniyama iti yat kiñcit yataḥ kutaścitsyāt /

atra upalabdheḥ upalabhamāna dharma tve tat jñānam upalabdhiḥ

analyzed: yatra niyamena yasya upalabdhiḥ bhavati yogyatāyāḥ aviśeṣāt sa tad saṃsṛṣṭaḥ eka jñāna saṃsargāt

pratyāsatteḥ āśrayaṇāt

original: sa kevalastadapekṣayā tadanyaśceducyate tadā tajjñānaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā jñātṛjñeya dharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ /

na pratiṣedha mātram

anya bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ abhāvaḥ svayam pramāṇa siddhaḥ tad abhāva vyavahāram sādhayet

original: (4.3) sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhistadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam?

original: (4.4) sambandhābhāvācca tacca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt,

original: ayaṃ cātra na sambhavati yataḥ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt /

original: saṃvādakamiti tadrūpamapratipattṛṇāṃ tataḥ pravṛttirna bhavatīti paropalakṣaṇātvādeva
analyzed: saṃvādakam iti tat rūpam apratipattṛṇām tatas pravṛttiḥ na bhavati iti para upalakṣaṇā tvāt eva

original: pravartake jñānaṃ siddhamḥ tathāpi tāveva viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvau kecid darśanādarśanamātreṇa
analyzed: pravartake jñānam siddham tathā api tau eva viśiṣṭau bhāva abhāvau kecid darśana adarśana mātreṇa
vyavasthāpayanti iti teṣām niṣedha arthaḥ ayam niścita śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ
satoḥ api bhāva abhāva darśanayoḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ saṃśayāt

original: tasmāt pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva bhāvābhāvau sidhyata iti vipratipattinirāsārthamasmābhirniścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: tasmāt pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā eva bhāva abhāvau sidhyataḥ iti vipratipatti nirāsa artham asmābhiḥ niścita grahaṇam kṛtam
yatas api trairūpya vacana mātreṇa tad sādhana pramāṇa ākṣepa siddhiḥ
na jñānam pṛthak atas rūpa antaram bhavati
tena eva avagata tvāt
upalaya arthavat pakṣa dharma tvāt
anvaya vyatirekayoḥ api tarhi na pṛthakatvam
ekasya prayogāt ubhaya gateḥ iti ced na
hetoḥ sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ bhāva abhāvau na parasparam ākṣipataḥ

original: ekaṃ vākyamubhayaṃ gamayatītyucyate naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyeti /
analyzed: ekam vākyam ubhayam gamayati iti ucyate na ekaḥ arthaḥ svabhāvaḥ dvitīyasya iti

original: nanu tatraiva bhāva ityatra tadarthatayā tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate,
analyzed: nanu tatra eva bhāvaḥ iti atra tad artha tayā tad abhāve abhāvaḥ gamyate

original: atadbhāve 'vaśyamabhāva ityatra ca tadbhāve bhāva iti parasparākṣepa iti cet /
analyzed: a tad bhāve avaśyam abhāvaḥ iti atra ca tad bhāve bhāvaḥ iti paraspara ākṣepaḥ iti ced
vacanam etat sāmarthyāt ubhayam ākṣipati ekasya api niyama khyāpakasya dvitīya ākṣepa nāntarīyaka tvāt
na ca tāvatā ubhayoḥ eka svabhāva tā
pṛthak abhidhānam tu prayoga niyama artham
na punar kevalau bhāva abhāvau parasparam ākṣipataḥ
niyamavantau ca na kevalau niyamasya ubhaya rūpa tvāt

original: (5.15) tasmāt tatraiva bhāva iti na bhāva evocyate itareṇāpi nā bhāva eva yena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā dvitīyamākṣipet /
analyzed: tasmāt tatra eva bhāvaḥ iti na bhāvaḥ eva ucyate itareṇa api nā bhāvaḥ eva yena bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ vā dvitīyam ākṣipet
na evam jñānam
para upalakṣaṇa śāstra agṛhīta jñānāt trailakṣaṇyāt avyatirekāt iti na lakṣaṇa antaram
tasmāt atra hetuḥ ṣaṣ lakṣaṇaḥ
hetu binduḥ ācārya dharmakīrti kṛtaḥ samāptaḥ
